name: RoboBastion
description:
Robo Bastion is a tower defence game, where instead of the usual upgrades to strengthen your towers, you give them items to boost their power. Featuring 16 items, there are 560 combinations to have on your tower!

TorniTollot:

  • Tuomas Vartiainen - Producer / Art Lead
  • Joona Rissanen - Programmer / Code Lead
  • Otto-Pekka Taskinen - Programmer / Design
  • Valtteri Leino - Artist
  • Jenni Hakala - Artist
